name: The Adventures of Yellow & Green
description:
Made in 14 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Yellow & Green are two robots remaining in the now extinct and polluted world.

They are connected,  and have to reach the doors to progress.

Controls for Keyboard:

AD or <- -> to move.

Space bar to jump.

E to switch player.

Controls for Xbox controller:

Left Joystick to move.

A to jump.

Y to switch Player.
